article_text: After starting Oliva Cigar company from scratch, Jose Oliva has now become one of the Florida Legislature’s top leaders by applying his business skills to politics where, he says, you should ‘play with your cards face up.’

article_metadata.news-keywords: Jose Oliva, Oliva Cigar, Florida House, Republican, legislature, redistricting, gerrymander
